item.title: NodeJS JWT Authentication Tutorial
item.description: Welcome fellow programmers! In this tutorial, we are going to be looking at how we can add authentication to our NodeJS applications using JWTs. We’ll be creating a REST API that feature a mixture of authenticated and un-authenticated JSON endpoints and we’ll be implementing a nice and simple JWT validation function that will verify incoming requests to ensure they have the appropriate authorization header set and that the value of that header is a verified JSON Web Token!
